titleStmt.title: A general epistle to the people of God, in scorn called Quakres, in England, and elsewhere
titleStmt.author: Rigge, Ambrose, 1635?-1705.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing; date of publication from end of text.
Reproduction of the original at the Bevan-Naish Collection, Woodbrooke College, Birmingham.
